### Evaluation of the Indigenous Skills and Employment Training (ISET) Program

#### Programme de formation pour les compétences et l’emploi destiné aux Autochtones (PFCEA)

---

**Tender Reference:** cb-775-97486195
**Tender Title:** Evaluation of the Indigenous Skills and Employment Training (ISET) Program.

**Publication Date:** 2024-01-25
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-08T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Procurement Category:** Services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering

**Evaluation Criteria:**
- Technical Merit
- Price
- Combined Rating

**Description:** 
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites proposers to submit their qualifications to conduct the evaluation of the Indigenous Skills and Employment Training (ISET) program. Proposer(s) must demonstrate expertise in Indigenous evaluation, research, and experience working with Indigenous peoples and communities.

**Key Objectives:**

1. Design and conduct various lines of evidence for the program's evaluation.
2. Co-develop methodology with Indigenous partners and ESDC.
3. Adapt the methodology to meet the needs of Indigenous partners using a distinction-based approach.

**Data Collection Methods:** 
Proposer(s) must adapt the methodology to incorporate various data collection methods, including:

- Key Informant Interviews
- Case Studies
- Focus Groups
- Storytelling
- Sharing Circles
- Photovoice and/or Video Voice
- and other culturally-relevant methods.

**Understanding Indigenous Relationships:**
Proposer(s) must work collaboratively with Indigenous partners to understand their culture, history, and ancestral ties to the lands and territories. This includes acknowledging the rights and obligations ESDC has towards Indigenous peoples.

**Supporting Documents:**
Access the tender documents on Canada Buy Service via [the following link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30432/100025672-npp-english.pdf) and [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30432/100025672-npp-french.pdf).

**Contact:** 
For further information about this contract, please contact:
- Indigenous Evaluation Consultant: Patrick.blais@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
- Tender Support: (000) 000-0000.
